name: Fried Manchego Cheese
author: Starrynight
summary: A fabulous Manchego cheese appetizer for a cocktail party, or even a dinner party.
ingredients: 12 ounces Manchego cheese, cut into two wedges
vegetable oil for deep frying, or as needed
directions: Combine jalapeno and cilantro together in a bowl
Coat both Manchego cheese wedges with the mixture
Mix all-purpose flour, water, and crushed ice together in a bowl until there are no lumps in the flour
Dip cheese wedges into the batter
Heat vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat
Dip cheese wedges into hot oil and fry until batter is crispy and browned, 3 to 4 minutes
Transfer fried cheese to paper towels layered on a plate to drain excess oil
